sentences.sContent: The students' cupboards are very commodious.
sentences.sCn: 学生们的橱柜非常宽敞。

sentences.sContent: Accidentally, I came across a cicada slough. I was really content with its commodious and safe place.
sentences.sContent_eng: Accidentally, I came across a cicada slough. I was really content with its commodious and safe place.
sentences.sCn: 无意中找到了一只蝉蜕，它壳内宽敞又安全的空间让我十分满意。

sentences.sContent: Open whereas commodious yard outside can serve as privately owned outdoors ground, also can become privately owned temporary parking lot for banquet guests.
sentences.sContent_eng: Open whereas commodious yard outside can serve as privately owned outdoors ground, also can become privately owned temporary parking lot for banquet guests.
sentences.sCn: 空旷而宽敞的庭院外，可作为私家户外休闲活动的场地，亦可成为私家宴会的客宾临时停车场。

remMethod.val: com + mod(=code方式， 范围) + ious → 大的范围 → 宽敞的

trans.tranOther: a house or room that is commodious is very big
